spine_hook: Success = flagship footfall +10–15% with early-window buyer share rising to 20–30% while event CPA stays ≤0.80× baseline and QR redemptions ≥5% of footfall.

anchors.headline: Foot traffic uplift (base target)
anchors.expression: In-store footfall +10–15% vs a pre-campaign baseline week

anchors.headline: Early-window buyer share (current baseline)
anchors.topic: Share of transactions within first 48 hours of event/drop
anchors.expression: Currently 12–15% of weekly transactions occur in early-window

anchors.headline: QR redemption minimum
anchors.expression: At least 5% of footfall redeems QR-linked offer or registers

measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Keeps acquisition efficient so in-store tests do not trade margin for footfall.

measurement_plan.metric: Buyer activity share vs promo intensity
measurement_plan.expression: Early-window transactions rise to 20–30% while promo SKU share does not exceed LY by >5p.p.
measurement_plan.notes: Track early-window buyer share and percent of assortment on promotion side by side daily.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Paired metrics show whether buyer mix improves or growth is just deeper discounting.
Direct test of whether local activations pull community traffic without sitewide promos.

measurement_plan.metric: QR redemption to footfall ratio (incremental activation)
measurement_plan.expression: QR redemptions ≥5% of counted footfall with tracked conversion lift
measurement_plan.notes: Use QR scans with promo codes and POS link to attribute purchases; include control days with no QR.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Shows measurable physical-to-digital capture and direct buyer conversion from micro-community engagement.
